snippet.title: PLAYNE - The Meditation Game - Trailer
snippet.description:
An indie game designed to help you to find calm, find balance and get grounded.Fox will teach you meditation and guide you through mindfulness, but it is you who must meditate to make the sun rise, to grow the trees, to bring balance back to Playne. 

Currently in Early Access.

Steam : https://store.steampowered.com/app/865540
Website : https://www.playne.co
Twitter : https://twitter.com/playne
